reviewText: I have no idea why this isn't more popular.  The well-developed information is very helpful, and believe me if you feel there's no hope for your teen, the ideas given are the only simple, yet detailed, way out I've found.  I've spent many hours over the past year looking everywhere for such information.  I'd ask myself at least every day after talking to my teen - what does he mean?  Why is this to important and emotional for him?  This dvd explains it all.
